trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The shark has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the shark's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Water Breathing
entries: the sharkfeather reef shark can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: the sharkfeather sahuagin has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Shark Telepathy
entries: the sharkfeather sahuagin can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness (Sahuagin)
entries: the sharkfeather sahuagin can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) slashing damage.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage, or 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage in melee, or {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage at range.
